creditline: Gift of Mrs. George W. Porter
description: Inrō in four parts of black lacquer decorated in design of waves with gold and mother of pearl bands; bound together with blue silk cord; ojime of similiar metal design; netsuke of similar pierced metal design
medium: Lacquer, gold, mother-of-pearl; ojime: metal; netsuke: metal; silk cord
signed: bottom in gold: 光悦図寛哉写 {Kōetsu zu Kansai sha}
title: Three-case inro with design of boats loaded with reed amid waves, in the style of Hon’ami Kōetsu
